description: A Colorado jury on Monday convicted the man accused of gunning down 10 people at a Boulder supermarket on all counts stemming from the horrific attack more than three years ago.
title: Colorado man found guilty of murdering 10 people at King Soopers market in Boulder

description: Israel has declared a state of emergency after Hezbollah fired dozens of rockets at Israeli military bases in response to an aerial assault campaign on Lebanon. NBC News’ Matt Bradley explains how the 48-hour declaration gives the Israeli military more power to restrict the movement of Israeli citizens and how wider Middle East conflicts are impacted by global leaders convening for the United Nations General Assembly.
title: Israel declares special state of emergency as Hezbollah returns rocket fire

description: Fears of a wider war are growing after Israeli forces carried out a wave of airstrikes in Lebanon over the weekend following a barrage of missiles fired at Israel by Hezbollah. NBC’s Richard Engel reports for TODAY.
title: Tensions escalate as Israel and Hezbollah exchange strikes

description: Officials were searching for a runaway bull in southern Massachusets early Monday after a herd of the animals jumped a fence at a rodeo event a day earlier.
title: Bull on the run after 8 break out of rodeo in Massachusetts

description: Should he return to the White House, Trump would to build a leadership team once again — a challenge made more daunting by his track record and his ability to win Senate confirmations for the loyalists he would need to carry out his orders.
title: Faced with the unique challenges of filling a potential Trump Cabinet, quiet transition work is underway
